import first from "../assests/first.jpg"; import second from "../assests/second.jpg"; import third from "../assests/third.jpg"; import "./CSS/careers.css"; $(document).ready(function () { $(".variable-width").slick({ infinite: true, speed: 2000, slidesToShow: 1, centerMode: true, variableWidth: true, centerPadding: 100, autoplay: true, touchMove: true, respondTo: window, }); var filtered = false; $(".ribbons").on("click", function () { if (filtered === false) { $(".variable-width").slick("slickFilter", ":even"); $(".ribbons").text("VIEW ALL"); filtered = true; } else { $(".variable-width").slick("slickUnfilter"); $(".ribbons").text("VIEW AUSTIN OFFICE"); filtered = false; } }); $(".grey-ribbon").on("click", function () { if (filtered === false) { $(".variable-width").slick("slickFilter", ":odd"); $(".grey-ribbon").text("VIEW ALL"); filtered = true; } else { $(".variable-width").slick("slickUnfilter"); $(".grey-ribbon").text("VIEW LOS ANGELES OFFICE"); filtered = false; } }); }); whr(document).ready(function () { whr_embed(126006, { detail: "titles", base: "jobs", zoom: "state", grouping: "none", }); }); function careers() { return ( <>

do what you{" "} {" "} everyday

Want to join the DC team? If you have a passion for planning & want to work for a rapidly growing entrepreneurial company, check out the listings below or send your resume to{" "} careers@dcikigai.com.

view job openings

benefits of being ec

  • competitive Insurance

    We provide health, dental and vision insurance options. Complementary life insurance is included too!

  • paid time off

    We believe that if you work hard, you get to play hard too. Enjoy paid time off in addition to all main holidays.

  • retirement options

    We care about your retirement and give you the freedom to customize your 401(k) options.

  • casual attire

    We keep it classy yet casual, so feel free to wear what you feel comfortable in!

  • coffee & tea bar

    Get the juices flowing every morning with complimentary coffee and tea.

  • community

    We host happy hours, employee appreciation events, and some awesome team building events.

  • california location:
    los angeles

    Our Hawthorne location is located in the heart of sunny Los Angeles, just 15 minutes from the beach!

  • texas location:
    north austin

    Our large North Austin location has plenty of free parking away from the crowds. Thereâ€™s a killer Donut shop down the road too.
